# Environment Variables Reference

Quick reference for all environment variables needed in production.

## Required Variables

### MongoDB
```bash
MONGODB_URI=mongodb+srv://user:password@cluster.mongodb.net/fairmediator?retryWrites=true&w=majority
```
- Get from MongoDB Atlas connection string
- Include username, password, and database name

### AI (Hugging Face)
```bash
HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY=hf_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
```
- Get FREE at: https://huggingface.co/settings/tokens
- No credit card required

### Authentication (Auto-generated by Render)
```bash
JWT_SECRET=<auto-generated-by-render>
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=<auto-generated-by-render>
SESSION_SECRET=<auto-generated-by-render>
```
- Click "Generate" button in Render dashboard for each

### Application
```bash
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=5000
```

### CORS & Frontend
```bash
CORS_ORIGIN=https://your-frontend-url.com
FRONTEND_URL=https://your-frontend-url.com
```
- Set to your actual frontend URL after deploying

## Optional Variables

### Rate Limiting
```bash
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=900000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100
```

### Stripe (Only if you enable payments)
```bash
# STRIPE_SECRET_KEY=sk_test_xxxxx (for test) or sk_live_xxxxx (for production)
# STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET=whsec_xxxxx
# STRIPE_PREMIUM_PRICE_ID=price_xxxxx
```
- Leave commented out until you're ready to accept payments
- Get from https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys

## Local Development (.env)

For local development, create `backend/.env`:

```bash
# MongoDB
MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/fairmediator

# AI
HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY=hf_your_key_here

# Auth (use any random strings locally)
JWT_SECRET=local_dev_secret_change_in_production
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=local_dev_refresh_secret_change_in_production
SESSION_SECRET=local_dev_session_secret_change_in_production

# App
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=5001
CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3000
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000

# Rate Limiting
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MS=900000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS=100
```

## Security Notes

- ⚠️ **Never commit `.env` files** to git (already in `.gitignore`)
- ⚠️ **Use different secrets** for production vs development
- ⚠️ **Rotate secrets** if they're ever exposed
- ✅ **Let Render auto-generate** JWT secrets in production
